description: Suitable for training or as a base for your racing waxes, this spray on liquid wax quickly penetrates your base for long-lasting glide in various snow conditions.Fluor-free liquid paraffin wax works best below the freezing point.Not humidity sensitive.Manual application lets you wax at the track without an iron.Recommended air temperature: -2 to -7C.
name: Swix HS7 Liquid Wax
